name: Wild Deer Sniper
description:
Jungle Deer Sniper is a real simulation of the most amazing jungle wild animals hunting trip first-person shooter play.Pick up your gun, move to the best sniper position,test your sniper skills in the game

Games Features
- First person shooting
- Unlimited bullets
- You can switch your sniper rifle
- Real jungle environment
- Easy controls
- Realistic 3D graphic & sound effects
